product.name: Mahanarayana Oil
product.bestFor: Paralysis, Head ailments, Muscles & joints pain due to Vata dosha. Ingredients- Rhizome of Hathavariya (Asparagus racemosus), Dashamul & Sesame oil
product.suggestedUse: Warm oil if desired. Apply to the target joints and muscles, massaging the area until the oil is mostly absorbed. Repeat 2–3 times daily or as needed. Daily can be used for body massage & used for Nasya, Drink & Enema as directed by the physician.
